<Text: The Federal Music Project
3:
--------------------
Text: Federal Music Project:  During the Great Depression, many people visited these symphonies to forget about the economic hardship of the time.
Triplets:<Federal Music Project

--------------------
Text: Federal Music Project:  In 1939, the FMP transitioned to the Works Progress Administration's Music Program, which along with many other WPA projects, was phased out in the midst of World War II.
